title: Understanding Data Governance
text: Data governance is a framework that ensures data is managed properly within an organization. It involves setting policies and procedures to ensure data quality, security, and compliance. Think about how having clear guidelines and processes can help an organization make informed decisions.

title: The Role of Risk Management
text: Consider how organizations deal with uncertainty. Risk management is about identifying, assessing, and prioritizing risks. Data governance can play a crucial role in this process by providing the necessary data to evaluate potential risks accurately.

title: Converting Uncertainty to Risk
text: Uncertainty is a lack of certainty or predictability in outcomes. Risk, on the other hand, is a quantifiable uncertainty. Think about how data governance can help transform vague uncertainties into measurable risks, allowing organizations to plan and strategize effectively.
